attributes.action: Urgently consider the dualling of the A1 Trunk Road in Northumberland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dualling of the A1 north of Morpeth to the Scottish Border throughout it's length in Northumberland would generate an increase in traffic by switching heavy goods vehicles from the more rural A68 and the A697. This would reduce the number of fatalities significantly and improve road safety within the county.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Urgently consider the dualling of the A1 Trunk Road in Northumberland."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14666.asp

Prime Minister's Office
